# Invitation to Tender: Armor Rock Installation at Wharf - Grande Entrée - Magdalen Islands Region

## Project Details

* Invitation to Tender Number: 30005201A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: December 21, 2023
* Closing Date for Tender: January 5, 2024, at 14:00
* Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada

## Project Description

This invitation to tender cancels and replaces the previous invitation to tender 30005201 for the armor rock installation at wharf - Grande Entrée - Magdalen Islands Region. The project involves:

* Demolition and disposal of structures shown on plans
* Excavation and management of wharf backfill within the specified limits
* Installation of new sections of armor rock protection
* Management of users' security on site

## Familiarization with Site

Before submitting a bid, bidders are encouraged to visit the site and its surroundings to review and verify the scope, nature, and extent of the work, required materials, mean of access, and site conditions. However, no allowance shall be made subsequently for errors or negligence in observing and determining the site conditions.

## Construction Time

The contractor must complete all work by April 26, 2024. Materials supplied by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) will be shipped to the site by DFO.

## Important Information

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has already acquired stones for the project, which will be available on January 15, 2024. Bidders are responsible for obtaining all necessary information regarding risks, contingencies, and other circumstances that may influence or affect their bid.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Florence Laurin
* Email: [florence.laurin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:florence.laurin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: (450) 495-0432
